title: Misaligned Laser from weapon attachments with Viewmodel FOV
body:
When you adjust viewmodel FOV, the laser from your guns laser attachment is not adjusted to the new viewmodel position, and so it appears like it is originating from the air, outside the weapon.

All is fine when viewmodel is set to 1.
author: anon-cfg

comments.body: There are no plans to fix issues stemming from increasing/decreasing the viewmodel FOV.

title: Release naming
body: Please rename the released package from something with `_Steam_...`  to something more generic (may be `..._windows_...` or something), since this should also work for GOG version of the game and otherwise looks confusing.
author: shmerl

comments.body:
Well adding the suffix `_Windows` certainly would be more confusing, given that the Xbox version is on Windows too. The main reason the separate releases even exists is due to the fact that the Xbox version uses a slightly different folder structure for the main game binary. 

Perhaps dropping the `_Steam` suffix on the "Steam" version would make more sense. That would indicate that you can use that for every other version but you need the Xbox release for that MS Store/Gamepass build.
Ah, I wasn't sure what xbox version is for. Sure, your idea works.
These changes have been implemented in the latest release.
